Pre-Game Insights: Paul George expressed his discomfort with playing small-ball center for the 76ers amid Joel Embiid's injury
Post-Match Reflections: Paul George said he's 'bored' playing small-ball center
Miscellaneous Highlights: Joel Embiid has missed the past three games with a foot injury and 23 games overall this season
Others: The 76ers are 15-21 and 11th in the Eastern Conference
